name: colorful bay
description:
collection : The Unique Ocean 
In Persian Poetry and Literature , the Oyster is a symbol of silence .
I was on the southern coast of Iran on the beautiful of Hengam island when the world was in silence and in isolation for Corona . < Hengam means the present moment >
I was collecting these beautiful oysters , which for me oysters are a symbol of hope in the majority of colors .
In fact , that oysters which coming on the shore mean the End of their lives and death , and I decided that , this was not the end of their lives.
Putting them together in a spectrum of colors on the mirror frame of their lives, they started together again so that this colorful bay would become a symbol of happiness , hope and color in our world .
